ban.Short Description: Ban a user from the server.

help.Short Description: DMs you about what the bot can do.

invite.Short Description: DMs you a hyperlink to an embed to invite the bot.

kick.Short Description: Kicks a user from the server.

mute.Short Description: Mutes a user in the server for an amount of time.

quicksetlog.Short Description: Set logs more faster with template options.

setlog.Short Description: Advanced command on customise log settings.

statuslog.Short Description: Print out current channels the logs will be posted to.
